name: Eric
description: Eric is a full-featured Python and Ruby editor and IDE. It is based on the cross-platform Qt GUI toolkit, integrating the highly flexible editor control. Eric includes a plugin system, which allows to download plugins from the Internet and is easy to extend into IDE function.

en_US.description: Eric is a full-featured Python and Ruby editor and IDE. It is based on the cross-platform Qt GUI toolkit, integrating the highly flexible editor control. Eric includes a plugin system, which allows to download plugins from the Internet and is easy to extend into IDE function.
en_US.name: Eric

zh_CN.description: Eric是一个全功能Python和Ruby的编辑器和IDE，它是基于跨平台的Qt GUI工具包，整合高度灵活的编辑控制。Eric包括一个插件系统，它允许使用从网上下载插件且易于扩展到IDE功能中。
zh_CN.name: Eric
